location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah, to Andrew Jukes Esq., in charge at the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to Andrew Jukes Esq., in charge at the Residency at Bushire, informing that Brigadier General Malcolm was expected to lead the occupation of Karrack [Kharg] Island and requesting Jukes to be available to leave Bushire [to join the mission to Tehran].
